body_html:
@kriszhangyf I think the flag you want is --fat_apk_cpu. IIRC --cpu merely refers to the host target.

Also, I'm not certain --config=android_x86 will do anything (that may have inadvertently come from Google-internal commands we use to build).
body_text:
@kriszhangyf I think the flag you want is --fat_apk_cpu. IIRC --cpu merely refers to the host target.
Also, I'm not certain --config=android_x86 will do anything (that may have inadvertently come from Google-internal commands we use to build).
body:
@kriszhangyf I think the flag you want is `--fat_apk_cpu`. IIRC `--cpu` merely refers to the host target.

Also, I'm not certain --config=android_x86 will do anything (that may have inadvertently come from Google-internal commands we use to build).
